name: OutRad
description:
Interactive music video!

Done as part of a 4 day game jam. First time using a new coding plugin called Bolt for unity. Learned a TON of stuff.


Music provided by Monstercat:

Half an Orange & Ephixa - Time Travel Kool Aid

PYLOT - Data
